text: Serdiana (Serdìana) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,650 people lived there. Its area is 55.71 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 171 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Serdiana
